questions.name: bathing
questions.display_question: How much has your bathing been limited by your health condition?

questions.name: dressing
questions.display_question: How much has your dressing been limited by your health condition?

questions.name: grooming
questions.display_question: How much has your grooming been limited by your health condition?

questions.name: feeding
questions.display_question: How much has your feeding been limited by your health condition?

questions.name: walking_inside_home
questions.display_question: How much has your walking inside the home been limited by your health condition?

questions.name: walking_outside_home
questions.display_question: How much has your walking outside the home been limited by your health condition?

questions.name: bladder_bowel_control
questions.display_question: How much has your bladder and bowel control been limited by your health condition?

questions.name: functional
questions.display_question: How limited is your functional capacity on a scale from 30% (requiring continuous nursing care) to 100% (no complaints about your functional capacity)?

questions.name: telephone
questions.display_question: How independently can you use the telephone?

questions.name: laundry
questions.display_question: How independently can you do your laundry?

questions.name: shopping
questions.display_question: How independently can you go shopping?

questions.name: meals
questions.display_question: How independently can you prepare meals?

questions.name: housework
questions.display_question: How independently can you do housework?

questions.name: medication
questions.display_question: How independently can you handle your own medication?

questions.name: fallen
questions.display_question: Have you ever fallen (lost your balance, tripped, or dropped to the ground without control)?

questions.name: when_fall
questions.display_question: When did you last fall?

questions.name: where_fall
questions.display_question: Where did you last fall?

questions.name: vision
questions.display_question: How is your vision?

questions.name: hearing
questions.display_question: How is your hearing?

questions.name: cane
questions.display_question: Do you use a cane?

questions.name: walker
questions.display_question: Do you use a walker?

questions.name: crutches
questions.display_question: Do you use crutches?

questions.name: wheelchair
questions.display_question: Do you use a wheelchair?

questions.name: brace
questions.display_question: Do you use a brace?

questions.name: prosthesis
questions.display_question: Do you use a prosthesis?

questions.name: hearing_aid
questions.display_question: Do you use a hearing aid?

questions.name: glasses
questions.display_question: Do you wear glasses?

questions.name: help
questions.display_question: How often do you have someone to help you with daily chores if you were sick?

questions.name: emotional_support
questions.display_question: How often do you have someone to turn to for suggestions about how to deal with a personal problem?

questions.name: enjoyable
questions.display_question: How often do you have someone to do something enjoyable with?

questions.name: loved
questions.display_question: How often do you have someone to love and make you feel wanted?

questions.name: interfere
questions.display_question: During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your social activities (like visiting friends or relatives)?

questions.name: social_activity
questions.display_question: Compared to your usual level of social activity, has your social activity during the past 6 months decreased, stayed the same, or increased because of a change in your physical or emotional condition?
answer_choices: Much less socially active than before
Somewhat less socially active than before
About as socially active as before
Somewhat more socially active as before
Much more socially active than before

questions.name: social_comparison
questions.display_question: Compared to others your age, are your social activities more or less limited because of your physical health or emotional problems?
answer_choices: Much less socially active than before
Somewhat less socially active than before
About as socially active as before
Somewhat more socially active as before
Much more socially active than before

questions.name: weight_yes_no
questions.display_question: In the past 6 months, has your weight changed?
answer_choices: Gained weight or no change in weight

questions.name: weight_change
questions.display_question: How much weight have you lost?
answer_choices: I've lost weight but less than 5 pounds
I've lost more than 10 lbs, but less than 20 pounds
I am not sure how my weight has changed

questions.name: satisfication
questions.display_question: Are you basically satisfied with your life?

questions.name: dropped_activities
questions.display_question: Have you dropped many of your activities and interests?

questions.name: happy
questions.display_question: Do you feel happy most of the time?

questions.name: prefer_staying_home
questions.display_question: Do you prefer to stay at home, rather than going out and doing new things?

questions.name: has_medications
questions.display_question: Are you taking any prescribed medications?

questions.name: num_medications
questions.display_question: Approximately how many different prescribed medications do you take each day?

questions.name: supplements
questions.display_question: Are you taking any supplements, including herbals and vitamins?

questions.name: num_supplements
questions.display_question: Approximately how many herbs, vitamins and supplements do you take each day?

questions.name: martial_status
questions.display_question: What is your current marital status?

questions.name: living_situation
questions.display_question: What is your current living situation?
answer_choices: Living with someone who is not family or partner

questions.name: education
questions.display_question: What is your highest level of education?

questions.name: smoked_30
questions.display_question: Have you smoked in the past 30 days?

questions.name: smoke_amount
questions.display_question: What is the average number of cigarettes packs you smoke per day?
answer_choices: Less than or a quarter of a pack
A quarter to half a pack
Half to three-quarters of a pack

questions.name: smoke_100
questions.display_question: Have you smoked at least 100 cigarettes (5 packs = 100 cigarettes) in your lifetime?

questions.name: smoke_age_start
questions.display_question: At what age did you start smoking?

questions.name: smoke_age_quit
questions.display_question: At what age did you quit smoking?

questions.name: smoke_frequency
questions.display_question: Do you smoke every day or some days?

questions.name: activities
questions.display_question: Tell me how comfortable you feel about doing activities, and how much assistance you need
answer_choices: Able to do daily activities, no symptoms
Able to do daily activities, minor symptoms
Able to do daily activities with effort, some symptoms
Able to care for myself, but unable to do daily activities
Need help sometimes, but able to care for myself most of the time
Need nursing care all the time

questions.name: alcohol
questions.display_question: Do you drink alcohol?

questions.name: alcohol_cut_down
questions.display_question: Have you ever felt you should cut down?

questions.name: alcohol_annoyed
questions.display_question: Have people annoyed you by talking to you about your drinking or drug use?

questions.name: alcohol_guilty
questions.display_question: Have you felt bad or guilty about your drinking or drug use?

questions.name: alcohol_morning
questions.display_question: Have you had a drink or used drugs first thing in the morning to calm your nerves or to get rid of a hangover?

questions.name: alcohol_per_day
questions.display_question: Do you have more than 4 drinks per day?

questions.name: home_health
questions.display_question: Do you have home care services now (such as a visiting nurse or home health aid)?

questions.name: assessment_taker
questions.display_question: Who completed this assessment?

current_question.name: help
current_question.display_question: How often do you have someone to help you with daily chores if you were sick?

conversation: Hello
Welcome to your health care questionnaire. Are you ready to start with the first question?
I am ready
Great! Let's start. Could you tell me how much your health condition has limited your ability to bathe? Would you say it's not limited, limited a little, or limited a lot? (id: 1)
yeah maybe things been pretty fine actually
I understand. So, would you say that your ability to bathe has not been limited by your health condition? (id: 1)
yeah i would say that
That's good to hear. Now, how about dressing? Has your health condition limited your ability to dress yourself? (id: 2)
no it hasn't
That's great to hear. Now, how about grooming? Has your health condition limited your ability to groom yourself? (id: 3)
m i like brushing my teeth
I see. So, would you say that your grooming has not been limited by your health condition? (id: 3)
correct
That's wonderful to hear. Now, how about feeding? Has your health condition limited your ability to feed yourself? (id: 4)
no definitely not
Great, I'm glad to hear that. Now, how about walking inside the home? Has your health condition limited your ability to do that? (id: 5)
Limited a little
I understand. Now, how about walking outside the home? Has your health condition limited that in any way? (id: 6)
Limited a lot
I see, thank you for sharing that. Now, how about your bladder and bowel control? Has your health condition limited that in any way? (id: 7)
Limited a little

I see, thank you for sharing that. Now, could you tell me how limited is your functional capacity on a scale from 30% (requiring continuous nursing care) to 100% (no complaints about your functional capacity)? (id: 8)
i'm not sure

That's okay. Let's try to break it down. If 100% means you have no complaints about your functional capacity and 30% means you require continuous nursing care, where would you place yourself on that scale? (id: 8)
Great, I'll note that as 70%. Now, let's talk about your ability to use the telephone. How independently can you use it? (id: 9)
Unable to do so
I understand. Now, could you tell me about your ability to do your laundry? Can you do it without help, with some help, or are you unable to do so? (id: 10)
With some help
I see. And how about shopping? Are you able to do it independently, do you need some help, or are you unable to do it? (id: 11)
Without help
That's great to hear. Now, how about preparing meals? Can you do it without help, with some help, or are you unable to do so? (id: 12)
Without help
That's wonderful. Now, how about housework? Can you do it without help, with some help, or are you unable to do so? (id: 13)
Unable to do so
I understand. Let's move on to your medication. How independently can you handle it? Are you able to manage it without help, with some help, or are you unable to do so? (id: 14)
With some help
I see, thank you for sharing that. Now, have you ever fallen, like losing your balance, tripping, or dropping to the ground without control? (id: 15)
No
That's good to hear. Now, let's talk about your mobility. Can you walk without help, with some help, or are you unable to walk? (id: 18)
Good
I'm glad to hear that your mobility is good. Now, how about your hearing? Would you say it's excellent, good, fair, or poor? (id: 19)
Excellent
That's wonderful to hear! Now, do you use a cane for assistance? (id: 20)
No
That's great to hear. Do you use a walker for assistance? (id: 21)
No
That's good to know. Do you use crutches? (id: 22)
No
I see, thank you for sharing. Do you use a wheelchair? (id: 23)
No
Alright, thank you for letting me know. Do you use a brace? (id: 24)
No
Okay, thank you for that information. Do you use a prosthesis? (id: 25)
No
Alright, thank you for letting me know. Do you use a hearing aid? (id: 26)
No
I see, thank you for sharing. Do you wear glasses? (id: 27)
No

Alright, thank you for letting me know. Now, how often do you have someone to help you with daily chores if you were sick? Would you say it's all the time, most of the time, some of the time, a little of the time, or not at all? (id: 28)
